post.text:
I just accepted the GOP nomination for President and now it's time to take the fight to Hillary Clinton! This is a MOVEMENT that's going to win back the White House! #TrumpIsWithYou

JOIN THE MOVEMENT: http://bit.ly/2afr5xQ

comment.author: Tatyana
comment.text: You're the bigot Donald -- you're the one trying to divide the country -- divide and hate -- make Americans hate each other -- it's the Republican formula for disaster ...

replies.author: Charles
replies.text: He is not he will make america great again john joseph mesh
